name: Google+, fixed position elements (Firefox)
description:
This version is for Firefox only, you can find the Chromium version here:
style 55726
The main menu and search bar, is fixed, so it stays even if you scroll, it's minimized and expands on hover. Sidebars are fixed, they wont move either.
So when you scroll the only thing that moves is the main content section.
additional_info:
2011-11-04: Fixed the problem with the right bar when visiting some ones profile page.

2011-11-03: Fixed the problem with the new YouTube bottom at top right, the bottom was added today and didn't work, but now does. And from now this version is only for Firefox, a version for Chrome is linked on the description.

Tested on the last versions of Firefox and Chromium.
